===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A vermilion powder to be inhaled, as used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "expel ''summer heat and evil factors'', to promote resuscitation, to alleviate pain when indicated by symptoms of dizziness, headache, stuffed nose, nausea and vomiting caused by ''summer heat'', carsickness, or seasickness.".
